inn1.comm: good length angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, left alone by the batsman
tight line and length again outside off stump, left alone once again
Marsh gets off the mark by turning a good length ball off his pads behind square
Steyn gives Hussey a bouncer first up but the line is down leg side and that's a wide
Hussey moves forward and opens the face of the bat to steer the ball through gully towards third man
Steyn keeps it tight around off stump, good length, Marsh defends towards cover on the front foot
142 kmh outside off stump, Marsh lets it go through to Boucher
good length on middle stump, Hussey pushes towards the leg side
fuller ball on middle stump, Hussey stays in his crease and plays on the leg side
full once again with a hint of swing, Hussey plays down the ground towards mid-on
Albie gives Hussey a bit too much width, he moves forward, uses the full length to drive the ball fluently through cover
Hussey nudges off the front foot towards mid-off for a single
Marsh taps the last ball off the over towards midwicket
he's beaten him! Steyn pitches on a good length around off stump and seams the ball away from Hussey who tries to defend on the back foot
Hussey moves back once again and defends towards point
fuller ball outside off, Hussey moves on to the front foot to play the cover drive but can't pierce the infield
close leave outside off stump, Hussey moved forward and shouldered arms to one that bent back in a touch

caught! The previous delivery came in but this one moved away from the left-hander off a good length around off stump, Hussey pushed forward to defend and the thick outside edge flew through to Boucher who took a comfortable catch to his left
good length delivery on off and middle, Ponting tries to turn it on the leg side but misses and gets hit on the pad

that was a chance! Ponting dug out an inswinging yorker towards extra cover and set off for a supremely risky single, it was JP Duminy who swooped on the ball, Ponting was miles out but Duminy missed the under-arm throw at the bowler's end, what a let off for Ponting
pushed on the off side on the front foot
stunning shot! Marsh moves forward and punches a length delivery down the ground, he begins to set off for the single but quickly realises he doesn't need to run
this time Marsh wanted to drive and then decided to leave the delivery, he was late in pulling his bat out of the way and the inside edge went past his stumps towards fine leg
played towards gully on the back foot
defended on the off side

Steyn thinks he's got Ponting lbw but umpire Ian Gould says not out! Ponting was squared up and struck right in front but the impact was a bit too high, or was it? Close call, the impact was just above the knee roll, replays show the ball clipping the top of the stumps
driven off the front foot but it doesn't get past mid-on
defended on the off side off the front foot
pushed off the front foot towards cover
Ponting gets on to the front foot and drives a good length ball towards point
tight lien and length outside off, Ponting comes forward and pushes towards point
Ablie seams the ball away from Marsh from a good length and beats the outside edge of the back-foot poke
straighter line this time and Marsh moves across to turn the ball towards midwicket
Ponting lunges forward to drive on the up but mis-times it, he chips it in the air but he's placed it in the gap at cover
Albie hits a good length outside off and cuts the ball into the right-hander, Ponting gets on to the front foot and blocks
fuller ball on middle stump, Ponting leans across and drives towards mid-on, quick single taken
Marsh stays on the front foot and pulls the ball past square leg, he didn't time that all that well

good length but a touch wide outside off stump, Ponting stays in his crease and drives the ball through cover point, Duminy gives chase and scores a direct hit at the striker's end, Ponting is safe though
fuller ball outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards mid-off

another huge appeal for lbw! Steyn bowled a full ball at 145 kmh around off stump, Ponting came forward to drive but was beaten for pace and struck above the knee roll, close call again but Gould says not out, replays show the ball taking the top of the stumps again, it was a bit high
Ponting tries to pull but mis-hits the ball through square leg
Marsh gets behind the line of a good length delivery and blocks
defended on the back foot towards the off side
good length delivery outside off stump, Ponting punches with a straight bat towards extra cover
shot! Ponting charges Albie who sees the batsman coming and bowls a short ball, Ponting continues his charge and pulls the ball powerfully over midwicket, the ball drops just inside the boundary
he goes over the top again! Albie follows the short one with a full ball, Ponting moves forward and lofts the ball cleanly over the bowler's head, he didn't follow through much with the bat
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
Ponting's getting a move on, he drives the length delivery through point off the front foot, Duminy chases and the batsmen run three
in the air but just short! Marsh tries to flick the ball off his pads but hits it in the air towards Duminy at midwicket
he's timed it well but hit it straight to point, Ponting came forward and drove the ball fluently towards Gibbs
Steyn bowls a full ball angling into middle stump at 147 kmh, Ponting moves forward and nudges towards midwicket

slower ball but the line is down leg side, Ponting waits on the front foot for the 119 kmh delivery to reach him and then plays a delicate leg glance towards the fine-leg boundary, Ablie dives but can't save the four
oh my he's hit that well but straight to cover point, Ponting's looking dangerous now
good length outside off stump, Ponting moves back and defends towards cover point
Ponting gets on to the front foot and thumps a good length ball towards mid-off, there's an ominous sound when the ball meets the bat
good length delivery outside off, Marsh places the ball towards gully and sets off

another massive lbw shout against Ponting! He moved across his stumps and tried to pull but missed, the ball hit him on the knee roll but the height was the issue once again, yet again replays show the ball taking the bails off, that's the third such shout he's survived
driven towards cover point for a single
Marsh waits for a short of a length delivery and cuts towards third man
slower ball outside off stump, Ponting moves forward and opens the face to play the ball towards point
good length delivery outside off stump, Marsh dabs the ball towards Amla at third man
good length outside off from over the wicket, defended on the front foot towards cover
Marsh stays on the back foot and gets squared up while defending a short of a length ball towards point
short of a length on leg stump, Marsh tries to pull but misses and gets hit on the body
Ponting loves it there! The ball wasn't that short but Ponting got into position so quickly on the front foot by swivelling and pulled the ball over midwicket

pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a quick single, Marsh's bat got stuck in the ground and he would have been out had Botha hit the stumps direct, I'm not sure Marsh realised the throw was coming at his end
driven superbly down the ground for four, that's the second such shot he's played today
defended towards backward point
Ponting moves forward and drives towards Gibbs at point
another slower ball, Kallis has bowled a lot of those today, defended on the leg side
and yet another slower ball at 119 kmh, Ponting nudges towards mid-on and runs the single to bring up the 50 partnership
Kallis bowls a tight length on middle stump, Marsh gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
Kallis ends the over with a slow ball (116kmh), Marsh waits for it on the back foot and steers the ball past gully, who dives to his right, towards third man
good length ball at 140 kmh just outside off stump, Marsh chooses to let it go through to Boucher
that's a fullish ball and Marsh manages to cut it towards deep point
good length delivery from Morne, defended on the back foot
pushed on the off side on the front foot
steered off the front foot towards third man
pushed off the front foot through cover for a single to end the over
short of a length on leg and middle, played off the pads towards midwicket

dropped! Ponting's so lucky today! He tried to smash the ball over the leg side but ended up hitting the ball in the air towards van Jaarsveld at square leg, the fielder reached up over his head and got both hands to the ball but spilled it, then there was a run out chance against Marsh at the batsman's end but that was missed as well, what shambles
defended on the on side
Marsh tries to play the ball behidn square but misses the flick and gets hit on the pad, that pitched outside leg
defended on the back foot
the slower ball on leg stump, Marsh leans across and whips the ball towards fine leg
short ball and Marsh comes forward initially but transfers his weight on to the back foot to pull the ball through the gap at midwicket
cut off the back foot towards point
good length outside off but Marsh manages to come forward and play a cut towards deep point
pushed off the front foot towards mid-on
Ponting strides forward and lofts a good length ball over extra cover, he was looking for the boundary but didn't time it
not on that evidence! Morne drops a fraction short, Ponting comes forward and take his eyes off the ball while pulling but still manages to hit it along the ground and in the gap at deep square leg
pushed towards cover for a single
good length delivery angling into the right-hander, nudged of the front foot towards midwicket
Ponting comes forward once again and closes the face of the bat to tap the ball into the gap at midwicket
defended on the front foot once again
good length delivery outside off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover point
Marsh goes back to a good length delivery and hits it wide of mid-on for a single
full toss and Marsh moves forward and drives down the ground
bowled outside off stump, Ponting leans forward, reaches out for the ball, and pushes towards point
Marsh stays in his crease and drives towards long-on again
Ponting leans forward and turns a straight ball off his pads behind square, the field is spread far and wide, singles are easily available
Marsh moves back to cut but gets cramped for room, he ends up hitting it to short third man
driven off the front foot past the bowler for a single to end the over, five off it
good length delivery outside off stump, defended towards cover
Marsh walks across his stumps and flicks a full ball through square leg

Ponting moves forward, out of his crease, and drives the ball back at Kallis who sticks out his right hand and fields, he then throws the ball back at the stumps but misses, Ponting scampered back to his crease
defended on the front foot towards point
driven off the front foot towards wide mid-on
full ball outside off stump, Marsh moves forward and drives down the ground for a single
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
Marsh comes forward and cuts through cover point for one
defended on the leg side
short ball outside off stump, Ponting moves back and cuts towards deep point
tossed up into the blockhole, Marsh makes room by moving towards leg and drives towards cover where a fumble from Gibbs allows the single
Botha cramps Marsh for room by angling the ball into the left-hander from round the wicket, Marsh moves towards leg and dabs the ball towards short third man
slower ball, 117 kmh, Marsh stays in his crease and whips the ball off his pads behind square
121.6 kmh, Marsh plays the ball towards the leg side
good length ball on middle stump, Marsh moves forward and taps the ball towards mid-on
Ponting moves forward and drives a length delivery towards wide mid-off where Albie dives to his left and cuts it off
Marsh moves back and nudges a good length ball off his pads through midwicket
Ponting gets on to the front foot and defends a short of a length ball towards midwicket
Marsh moves towards leg to a flighted delivery and plays towards the off side
awesome fielding! Gibbs leaps to his right at cover and pulls off a one handed save, Marsh timed the cover drive well
Marsh goes over Gibbs this time by moving towards leg and chipping the ball over cover, the ball skids across the grass and races to the boundary
cut down to deep point for a single

stumped! No, caught! Ponting pushed forward to a defend a straight delivery outside off stump but edged it, Boucher didn't realise at first for he whipped off the bails but eventually appealed for caught behind, Ian Gould raised the finger immediately
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
wide outside off, angling away, and Marsh lets it go. Fancy doing that in an ODI?
fullish on the pads, marsh looks to turn it to leg, but doesn't find a gap
that's accurate, straight on the stumps, just short of driving length, and played to mid-off
this one was wider, and glided away to thirdman
just short of length, just outside off, Clarke gets on the front foot and defends it to cover
short of length, on the stumps, Clarke hasn't been in long enough to go for pull shot
tossed up outside off, and Marsh steps out, and drives to wide of mid-off for a single
Clarke steps out too, and finds the ball is shorter and defends it back
fulltoss on the stumps, and played to long-on
there it is, 50 for Marsh. Botha bowled this nicely, saw him come down, and shortened the length, but Marsh recovered and opened the face towards sweeper cover
shortish on the stumps, and Clarke fails to find the gap in the on side
scampered single, Clarke came down, was beaten in the flight, lucky to get pad onto it, and Marsh is alert for a single
well bowled and well played, honing on the stumps, tailing from outside off, and Clarke guides it to wide of mid-on, Amla chases well to keep it to two
just outside off, shortish, Clarke opens the face of the bat, but can't beat point
slower ball, 115ks, on the stumps, and defended back to the bowler
another slower one, Clarke defends this towards mid-on this time, and calls right away for a single, which is comfortably completed
just short of length, starts on the stumps, angling across, Marsh defends with an open face
this was shorter, and gave marsh time to make room and guide it to sweeper cover
ordinary loosener, outside leg, slow, and Marsh turns his wrists on it to take a couple to fine leg, where Amla makes a diving face
on the pads again, and turned away for an easy single
just short of length, on the off stump, and Clarke defends it to the bowler
fuller, around off stump, Clarke looks to drive it straight, but the bat turns in his hand, and thus he can't beat mid-on
full on the stumps, Clarke looks to turn it away but can't beat mid-on
finally gets the drive right, another overpitched delivery, just outside off, Clarke plants his front foot down, and crashes it to the right of mid-off who has no chance to save the boundary
Marsh takes a step out of his crease and defends a slow delivery on the off side
shot! Marsh steps out of his crease, makes room by moving towards leg, and lofts the ball superbly over long-on for six!
flicked off the pads behind square
Marsh drives towards wide mid on for a single
Clarke steps out but ends up defending towards the leg side
Clarke gets down on one knee and sweeps from outside off stump
short of a length outside off stump, Clarke stays on the back foot and plays the ball towards point
Morne drifts on to the pads, Clarke moves across and nudges the ball off his pads behind square
the short ball doesn't bounce that much, Clarke tries to play a short-arm pull but the ball goes under his bat
nudged off the front foot towards mid-on for a quick single
Marsh moves forward and then cuts a length delivery towards point
good length but the line is too straight, Marsh plays the ball off his pads towards square leg
the quicker ball skids through on Marsh and hits him on the pad
played off the pads towards long-on for a single
Clarke strides forward and defends back towards the bowler
tossed up on middle and leg, Clarke comes out of his crease and drives towards long-on
Marsh steps out and uses the angle into him from round the wicket to hit the ball into the gap at square leg
Marsh waits for the ball from his crease and cuts through cover point, excellent running, two more
short of a length on leg stump, played off the pads down to fine leg for a single
fuller length on middle and off, Marsh moves forward and pushes towards mid-off
good length just outside off stump, Marsh opens the face and plays the ball towards point

dropped! Marsh leans forward to flick the slower ball but ends up mis-hitting it in the air towards midwicket, McKenzie dives to his left but ends up diving over the ball, he only just got fingertips to it, South Africa have not matched their usual high standards in the field
defended back to the bowler
driven of the front foot towards the off side
short of a length outside off stump, Marsh punches it past the bowler and runs the single before mid-off gets to the ball
good length on off stump, Clarke can't leave the crease so he pushes towards cover on the front foot
that's a bit too short so Clarke has the room to pull the ball from outside off towards square
driven off the front foot towards mid-off, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but Marsh is too quick
too full on leg stump, Clarke flicks the ball between long leg an deep square leg, van Jaarsveld runs to his right and fields
good length delivery on middle and off, Marsh goes back and punches towards the bowler, Albie sticks his left hand out and fields
a bit short on off stump, Clarke moves back and nudges the ball towards short fine leg
shouts of catch after Clarke misses the sweep, the umpire calls it wide for the ball was down leg side
played towards midwicket
that was the quicker one, 101 kmh, on middle stump, Clarke defends on the back foot
played off the pads towards midwicket where Gibbs cuts off any runs
Clarke lunges forward and defends a good length ball on the leg side
pushed off the front foot towards long on for a single, only two runs off the over
played back to the bowler on the front foot
tight line and length on off and middle, Clarke has to stay in his crease because Boucher is standing up, he defends to the bowler

caught in the deep! The pressure was building on Clarke and he went for it, lofting a length ball off the front foot towards long-on, Amla was on the boundary and he had to take several steps back to hold the catch, he took a quick look behind to see where the rope was, it was a few feet away from him
excellent line and length, on middle stump, Hussey stays in his crease and defends to the bowler
Hussey stays on the back foot and opens the face late to guide the ball towards third man
the slower one at 112 kmh, Marsh adjusted late and defended towards the bowler
played off the pads towards short fine leg
Hussey leans forward and works the ball towards midwicket for one
Marsh makes room by moving towards leg and drives a ball which angles into him from round the wicket towards long off
driven down the ground towards long on, Australia reach 150
Duminy fires the ball into the blockhole, Marsh makes room and drives through cover
that's a dangerous shot, Marsh tried to cut the ball from middle stump, he bottom-edged it into the ground past the stumps and the wicket-keeper
Marsh gets a single by working a good length ball off his pads behind square
Albie gets the ball to swing into the right-hander, Hussey digs it out from the blockhole towards point and sets off immediately
slower ball on leg stump, Marsh stays in his crease, swivels, and pulls towards long leg
Hussey moves forward and drives a good length ball towards mid-off for another single
fuller length and Marsh drives firmly off the front foot towards long on, the fielder is on the boundary for him
flicked off the pads towards midwicket where Duminy dives to his right and saves runs, there's a mix-up between the batsmen but they make the single
short and wide outside off stump, Hussey reached out for it and cut through cover, it might have been wide had he let it go
Marsh goes back and fends at a length delivery from Steyn, he gets an outside edge towards third man
banged in short outside off stump at 143 kmh, Hussey lets the ball pass
short and wide again, Hussey doesn't connect with the swipe and this time it's been called wide by the umpire
driven towards mid-off for a single, the fielder throws at the non-striker's end but fine leg hasn't come in to back up
banged in short outside off stump, Hussey sways out of the way

dropped! And it's a sitter! Steyn dug the ball in short again outside off stump, Hussey went back and cut the ball high in the air over cover point, van Jaarsveld ran in from the boundary, slid on to his knees as he reached the ball but spilled it, that's his second drop of the day, what a poor debut he's having in the field
cut down to third man for a single
full ball outside off stump, driven off the front foot through cover
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
Hussey tries to cut but misses
Hussey jumps back and nudges a short of a length delivery off his hips towards square leg
defended on the front foot towards Gibbs at point
good length ball outside off stump, 148 kmh, Hussey lets it go again
sharp short ball at 144 kmh, Hussey lifts his hands out of the way in a hurry
Hussey went on the back foot and cut a short of a length ball hard towards point where Gibbs fields and gets ready to throw if the batsmen dare take a run

the slower one outside off stump, Hussey dabs the ball towards backward point where Gibbs fields again, this time Hussey goes for the single but gets sent back, Gibbs throws but misses, Hussey was short of his crease
cracking shot! Hussey moves forward and cuts the ball hard past Gibbs towards the boundary, brilliant timing
fuller ball on off stump, defended towards the off side, no runs in the over apart from that four

caught! Good length from Morkel, he pitches in line with the stumps and moves the ball off the seam away from the left-hander, Marsh tries to close the face and play the ball on the leg side, the ball hits the hilly side of the bat and goes through to Boucher

White moves across his crease and nudges the ball off his hips towards midwicket, Duminy swoops on the ball, turns around and throws at the bowler's end, he misses but White would have been just in anyway
Hussey leans forward and drives a full ball through cover for two more
short of a length outside off stump, Hussey gets on to the back foot and defends towards point
short of a length outside off stump, Hussey cuts towards third man, Steyn throws the ball towards Boucher, it's a difficult one to collect and he gets hit on the body
short of a length outside off stump, the ball leaps up at White who fends it away towards point
nudged off the pads towards midwicket for a single
glanced off the pads towards short fine leg, Hussey is so quick that the fielder has to throw to the bowler's end, White makes it too
defended towards midwicket
driven off the front foot towards long on for one
White stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
good stuff from Botha, only three off the over, White nudges the last ball off his pads towards short fine leg
driven off the front foot towards long on for a single
short of a length on off and middle, White stays in his crease and defends towards the bowler
White goes back to play the ball on the leg side, Kallis bowls a slower one and White closes the face of the bat too early, he gets a leading edge towards cover
White goes back again and works the ball towards square leg for a quick single
115 kmh, Kallis bowls a cutter outside off stump, Hussey pushes towards point, he won't get a single, Australia have scored only 9 off the last 16 balls
another slower cutter, Hussey plays it straight to point again, Australia are stagnating a little
bowled full on off and middle, White drives the ball towards wide long on
Hussey moves across his stumps and nudge sthe ball to short fine leg where McKenzie fields, the batsmen run a very risky single but Hussey runs between the ball and the stumps
full toss played through square leg
played through midwicket for another single
driven down the ground towards long on
Botha ends the over with a dot ball, Hussey defends towards Gibbs at midwicket
short of a length outside off stump, White cuts off the back foot but can't get past point
blasted! White makes room to a length delivery and launches the slower one flat over mid-off, the ball bounces once before going over the rope
a low full toss, White makes room but hits it towards cover, he'll be disappointed with that
Kallis bowls full and straight, Hussey drives off the front foot to long on
125 kmh, White makes room but ends up defending a good length ball towards cover
Kallis bowls a full ball into the blockhole, driven to long on once again, Kallis finishes an excellent spell, 10 overs for 35 runs
he falls over as he delivers the ball on a good length outside off, White drives towards long off
length delivery outside off stump once again, Hussey drives off the front foot towards long off
White began to make room by moving towards leg but Albie followed him, White ended up playing it to midwicket
White makes room again and nudges the ball behind square
the slower ball but it's too short, Hussey gets into position quickly and pulls the ball along the ground to the deep backward square leg boundary, Australia go past 200
Albie ends the over with an attempted yorker, Hussey plays it towards the leg side
shot! Hussey makes room and slices a short of a length ball over point for four, he's going to take Steyn on for sure
Hussey makes room and drives the ball powerfully towards long off
bowled full outside off stump, White stays in his crease and drives towards long off for one more
Steyn bowls a full ball at 139 kmh, Hussey mis-hits towards midwicket and gets only a single
that's a poor ball, a full toss on leg stump, White gets under it and helps the ball towards the long leg boundary, he didn't try to hit it hard at all
he's smashed it right back at Hussey! White made room and hit the ball very hard, Hussey had to scramble, the ball definitely lost pace so it must have hit some part of the non-striker

well done Steyn! White made room by moving towards leg and drove a full toss towards wide mid-off, it would have been four had it gone past the fielder but Steyn moved to his left and dived to save runs, he fell on his shoulder and is in a bit of pain, it's Steyn's left shoulder
that's a high full toss, Hussey pulls towards deep midwicket
Hussey makes room and tries to drive on the off side but gets yorked
that's a horrible ball, a friendly full toss and Hussey gleefully accepts the offering, he hammers the ball over mid-off for four
driven down the ground towards long on for one
bowled him! That was a fast ball in the blockhole, 106 kmh! White tried to swat the ball towards midwicket but missed, Botha hit off stump
loose ball, a full toss on the pads, Hussey flicks the ball off his pads towards the long leg boundary, that's his fifty! van Jaarsveld's drop has cost South Africa
driven down the ground for a single
another low full toss, Haddin flicks towards van Jaarsveld at deep square leg
full ball on middle stump, driven off the front foot towards long off
good length and line on off stump, Haddin drives towards mid-off for one more

knocked him over! Albie bowls a good length ball on off and middle stump with a hint of swing into the right-hander, Hussey tries to hit across the line towards midwicket but misses, the ball crashes into off and middle stump
super shot! Haddin stays in his crease, waits for a short and wide ball, and cuts wide of the fielder at third man, precise placement
Haddin opens the face and guides the ball to Amla at third man, Haddin sprints back for the second
nudged towards midwicket, Wait! is the call but the fielder cuts it off
Haddin steps out and backs away to make room, Steyn bowls a short one and Haddin hits it down to third man, the ball reaches Amla on the bounce
the slower on on middle stump, nudged on the leg side
Amla in action again after Hopes gets a bottom edge while trying to cut the ball, the batsmen run two again
Haddin makes room and scoops the ball over the bowler's head, he checked his shot and placed it well between long on and off
too full on leg stump, poor line when fine leg is in the circle, Steyn dives to his left to cut off Haddin's flick
that's an awful ball, full and far down leg side, Boucher had no chance, five wides, what a gift for Australia
Morkel's bleeding here, Haddin gets on to the front foot and pulls a length ball over midwicket for four, crisp hit
driven off the front foot towards midwicket
Hopes tries to launch a length ball over cover but misses

van Jaarsveld finally catches one! He has relief written all over his face and he turns to the MCG crowd and gives them a stare. Hopes made room to hit over the off side but didn't get enough muscle behind the shot, he lofted the ball towards long off, van Jaarsveld ran in from the boundary and judged it well
Bracken pushes forward to a full ball and plays it past point for two runs, that ball hit the bat twice! The ball hit the inside edge and the outside edge according to hot spot, weird
defended on the back foot towards the off side
nudged towards short square leg for a single
Haddin waits for the slower one and pushes towards midwicket for one more
full ball outside off stump, Bracken drive the ball fluently through cover point for a single

The South Africans have finally scored a run out! Haddin pushes the ball towards cover an sets off for the single to keep strike for the final over, Albie rushes in, picks up, turns around, and throws down the stumps at the bowler's end, Haddin's well short
pushed off the front foot past Gibbs at point
take that! Bracken stands his ground and smashes a short ball over midwicket for four, Morkel's length is wrong
Morkel follows up with a full ball and Bracken chips the ball down the ground towards long-off, Hilfenhaus races back for the second
Bracken makes room by moving towards leg and slices the ball over backward point, two more
Bracken makes room and swings but misses, that was the slower one, Hilfenhaus is quick enough to steal the bye
what an absurd ball! It was miles down leg side and Boucher did extremely well to dive to his left and save five wides
Hilfenhaus misses the slower ball and Bracken manages to steal the bye again

inn2.comm: short of a length angling across the right-hander from over the wicket, Gibbs moves across to cover his stumps before letting it go
Gibbs gets going by turning a ball off his pads towards Tait at fine leg
full on leg stump once again, Gibbs leans across and flicks towards fine leg for one this time
short of a length on leg and middle, Amla moves back and nudges the ball off his pads towards square leg for one
good length on middle and leg, Gibbs stays in his crease and nudges towards midwicket
played off the front foot towards midwicket
145 kmh on a good length around off and middle, defended on the back foot towards the leg side

it's Tarzan at the moment! Tait hit a good length outside off stump, Amla played it from his crease and was unsure whether to play it or leave it, he decided to pull his bat out of the way too late and the ball went on to his stumps off the inside edge
Tait's fired the ball down leg side at 150kmh, Haddin does supremely well to move to his left and collect
he's up above 150 kmh this time - 151 - but the line is still down leg side, Kallis misses the glance but that's wide
short of a length outside off stump, Kallis stays in his crease and drives towards point
Kallis jumps on to the back foot and nudges a short of a length delivery towards midwicket
short and wide outside off stump, Kallis chooses to let it go through
that's gone off the pad to the fine-leg boundary, Tait angled down leg again and Gibbs missed the glance but the ball brushed his pad and went past Haddin
defended on the front foot towards the off side
defended off the back foot towards the off side
Kallis goes back in his crease and opens the face to play a good length ball towards point
Bracken pitches on a good length and shapes the ball into the right-hander after angling across him from over the wicket, Kallis stays in his crease and punches towards cover point
wider outside off this time, Kallis punches to short cover off the back foot
Bracken ends a maiden over with a slower cutter at 114 kmh, defended on the front foot towards the off side
good length and straight from Tait, Gibbs gets behind the line and defends from his crease
Gibbs has dismissed that! It was bowled short at 147 kmh outside off stump, Gibbs just stood on the front foot and pulled it in front of midwicket for four
slower ball on middle stump, Gibbs moves back and pushes towards mid-on
full and straight from Tait at 148 kmh, Gibbs pushes towards the off side with a straight bat
shot! The short ball from Tait sits up outside off stump, Gibbs stands tall on the front foot and swats the ball behind square for four more
fuller length this time but Gibbs uses the leg-stump line to flick through the gap between midwicket and mid on
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot by Gibbs
Giibs moves forward and defends a good length ball from leg and middle towards midwicket
fuller and straighter from Bracken, Gibbs moves forward and defends with a straight bat towards the bowler
short of a length on middle and off, Gibbs stays on the back foot and defends on the off side
Bracken pitches around off and seams the ball across the right-hander, Gibbs lets it go
Gibbs lets the ball go outside off again, Bracken pulls the run-rate back with his second maiden in a row
he starts off with a wide down leg side, Kallis misses the leg glance
a bit too straight from Hilfenhaus, Kallis moves back and across to flick the ball through square leg
short of a length outside off stump, Kallis stands on the back foot and cuts towards third man
poor line, Hilfenhaus strays outside leg stump and Gibbs nudges the ball past Haddin for four to fine leg
Gibbs tries to force a good length ball on the up through the off side but gets an inside edge toward the leg side
driven off the front foot past the bowler, he hasn't hit it hard enough to beat mid-on
Kallis moves back and across and plays the square drive towards point
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
short of a length on middle and leg, Gibbs stays in his crease and nudges towards square
good length outside off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover
Kallis moves right across to a good length ball and whips it off his pads through midwicket
short of a length delivery pitches outside leg stump and angles into Gibbs' hips, he nudges towards mid on for one
Bracken ends the over with a slower ball, Kallis moves forward and pushes towards cover
loose shot from Gibbs, he tries to drive a good length ball away from his body on the up through cover but was beaten, he takes a look at the pitch
the slower one, pushed off the front foot towards cover
Kallis pushes off his pads behind square for a single

he's played on! Gibbs once again tried to drive a good length ball outside off on the up through cover, he played a long way away from his body and got an inside edge on to the stumps, the ball didn't do much, just went straight through, Gibbs looks rather frustrated with that
short of a length outside off stump, Duminy gets off the mark right away by nudging the ball off his hips towards long leg
driven off the front foot towards cover
starts with a  full ball on off stump, played back to the bowler
good length ball outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
short of a length outside off stump, played off the back foot towards the bowler
fuller ball on middle stump, played into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a single
played back to the bowler off the front foot, Hopes fields on his follow through
short of a length outside off stump, defended on the back foot towards cover
good length once again outside off stump, Duminy defends on the off side
Hilfenhaus gives Duminy a bit of width outside off, Duminy stays on the back foot and drives behind point
Kallis moves forward and defends towards the off side
Kallis swivels and pulls the short ball in the air in front of square, there's a fielder in the deep but it's wide of him
Kallis moves forward to flick a straight ball on the leg side but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Duminy jumps back and steers the length delivery down to third man
Kallis stays in his crease and flicks the ball through square leg
Hopes bowls a bouncer outside off stump, Duminy beings to play the pull but bails out of the shot
driven fluently off the front foot towards cover
Duminy goes back in his crease and steers the ball towards third man
Kallis tries to drive through cover but gets an outside edge towards short third man
full and wide outside off stump at 143 kmh, Dumiiny lets the ball go through to Haddin
full and straight from Tait, Duminy moves forward and drives with a straight bat towards mid-on
Duminy moves forward and closes the face of the bat to play the ball to square leg
good length from Tait on off stump, Duminy strides forward and drives towards mid-off
too wide from Tait, Duminy moves forward and drives through cover for a single
Kallis stays on the back foot and opens the face to steer a short of a length delivery towards third man
full and wide outside off stump, Kallis reaches out for it and cuts wide of the fielder at third man
played towards square leg for a single
Duminy moves forward and plays a blistering drive towards cover where White dives to his right and makes the save
Kallis paddles the ball off the front foot behind square, there's a fielder in the deep
pushed off the front foot towards cover
that's deft, and four! Kallis stays on the back foot and waits for the ball to come to him, he opens the face late and guides the ball between short third man and the wicketkeeper
Duminy reaches out for a full and wide delivery but hits it straight to point
Duminy moves forward once again and drives a fuller ball towards mid-off
he's placed it superbly this time! Duminy moves forward and drives the full ball wide of the fielder at mid-off, he sprints back for the third as Michael Hussey gives chase
pushed off the front foot towards the off side
too full on leg stump, Kallis leans across and flicks the ball off his pads through square leg
Duminy moves forward and works the ball off his pads through midwicket
edged and four! Kallis aims for the booming drive through cover but gets a thick edge past the keeper to the third-man boundary
this time he stays on the back foot and opens the face to play the ball to third man again
short of a length outside off, Duminy moves back and defends on the off side
Duminy drives the full ball off the front foot towards long off
driven on the up towards Clarke at point, they run a quick single, Duminy would have been out with a direct hit
Duminy moves forward and across to nudge a full ball behind square
Duminy cuts off the back foot towards point
that's a bit short outside off stump, Kallis goes back and cuts the ball past point
Kallis tries to dab the ball behind square on the off side again but misses
pushed in front of point on the off side for a single
Duminy moves back and nudges towards the leg side for one
driven of the front foot through cover point for a single
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
Kallis is picking off the runs in the arc between third man and cover point, he dabs another one down towards the boundary
Duminy moves across to a short ball and pulls towards deep backward square
Kallis moves back and across to work the ball off his hips behind square
Duminy moves forward and drives the ball in the air but wide of the bowler towards mid-on
Duminy moves back and pushes a short of a length delivery in front of point for one
pushed down the ground towards long off for one
Kallis moves back to cut but gets beaten, Haddin whips off the bails
Kallis strides forward and drives a full ball towards cover
short and wide outside off stump, Kallis gets on to the back foot quickly and cuts towards deep point
flicked off the pads through midwicket for one
played through square leg for a single
that's a half-tracker to begin with it, on the pads, Kallis rocks back and pulls it to square leg boundary
full outside off, and defended to cover
Clarke makes the breakthrough, this one was a half-tracker again, Kallis saw another easy boundary, but this one was quicker and came in with the angle, defeating the pull and meeting the off stump.
another short delivery, McKenzie plays it towards midwicket
fuller, on the leg stump, McKenzie plays for the spin, but this one goes on with the arms, and hits his pad
wide outside leg, Haddin tries a stumping, but McKenzie hasn't moved
full on the stumps, and defended back to the bowler
flighted on the leg stump, JP goes for the sweep, and misses
just short of a length, on the stumps, and hit towards mid-off for a single
bowled flat through the air on off stump, defended on the back foot
played back to the bowler on the front foot
McKenzie leans forward and drives towards long on for a single, he's off the mark in his first ODI in five years
driven off the front foot to long on
defended on the leg side on the back foot
Clarke bowls a flat one on off stump, nudged off the pads towards midwicket
Clarke strays down leg side this time, wide called
driven off the front foot towards cover, they are zipping through the overs
McKenzie opens the face and steers the ball towards short third man
bowled into the right-hander from round the wicket, McKenzie defends
he starts with a wide down leg side
driven on the up towards cover off the front foot
short of a length outside off, Duminy chops the ball towards third man for one
McKenzie stays in his crease and opens the face to guide the ball towards third man
worked off the pads towards midwicket
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
McKenzie moves forward and defends a good length ball on the off side
played back to the bowler off the back foot
Duminy comes down the track and drives the ball towards long on
bowled flat through the air and straight, McKenzie nudges the ball towards the leg side, Haddin runs towards short midwicket and fields
McKenzie makes room and drives to David Hussey at cover
nudged into the gap on the leg side for a single
Duminy walks down the track and drives towards midwicket, he won't have the strike next over
banged in short outside off stump, McKenzie lets it go through to Haddin
steered off the back foot towards third man for one
full toss on the pads, Duminy flicks towards long leg, he's placed it towards fine leg's right and will get two
another short ball, a bouncer this time, Duminy ducks
one more short ball, Duminy ducks under it once again
the slower one to end the over, Duminy tries to cut but misses
tossed up outside off, McKenzie plays a big drive but hits it to Ponting at cover who fumbles to allow one
Duminy steps out of his crease and plays the ball through midwicket for a single
that's some placement! McKenzie moves on to the front foot and swats the ball flat over the infield, he splits the gap between deep midwicket and long on
he does it again, an identical shot but with more foot work this time, McKenzie hits it flat and hard into the gap at wide long-on, terrific placement for the second time in a  row
edged but safe! McKenzie tries to play a cheeky sweep but the top edge falls safely between the keeper and the man at short fine leg
driven to long on for one
short and wide outside off stump, Duminy plays a fierce cut off the back foot but can't beat Ponting at point
Hilfenhaus concedes a wide by straying down leg side
good length on off stump, Duminy pushes gently off the front foot towards long off
what has that hit? Hilfenhaus bowled a short ball and McKenzie tried to play the short-arm pull, the ball hit the top edge, went on to hit the helmet and lobbed up towards the off side
quick single taken after McKenzie defends towards the off side
good length ball on off stump, Duminy plays off the back foot towards point
loud shout for lbw after Duminy misses the flick against a full ball and gets hit on the pad, that looked like it pitched outside leg stump, Hilfenhaus is bowling from over the wicket
good length on off and middle, driven off the back foot down the ground
McKenzie nudges the ball off his pads towards the leg side for a single
that's a bit short and Duminy hits across the line through midwicket
Hopes appeals for leg before after Duminy misses the flick, that took the inside edge on to the pad, and it pitched outside leg stump
McKenzie is late in defending and gets an inside edge that bounces over his stumps, two South African batsmen have already played on today
dabbed behind point off the back foot for a single
he sends down a yorker first up, McKenzie misses the flick and gets hit on the pad, Tait appeals but that is missing leg
... to angle the ball into the left-hander, Duminy moves back and defends towards the leg side
Duminy jumps back and opens the face to steer a short of a length ball towards third man
McKenzie stays in his crease, waits for the ball outside off stump, and steers it towards third man for a single
Duminy drives the full ball through cover for a single
Tait bowls a full and fast delivery on off and middle stump, McKenzie keeps it out and defends on the off side
full ball on off stump, driven off the front foot towards long-off
McKenzie stays on the back foot and tries to steer towards third man, he gets beaten
played with soft hands on the off side, Duminy responds to McKenzie's call and sprints the single, Clarke runs in from point and hits the stumps, Duminy's super quick and he's made his ground
Duminy tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad
McKenzie plays the ball behind point by opening the face of the bat
driven firmly off the front foot towards cover
McKenzie tries to cut Tait but gets beaten for pace outside off stump
full ball angling into middle stump, McKenzie plays the ball towards midwicket
another full ball, this time on leg stump, McKenzie gets hit on the pad and they run a leg bye towards midwicket
full and wide outside off stump, Duminy moves forward and drives in front of point for a single
McKenzie waits for the fast ball outside off and cuts towards third man
full ball angling into the pads, Duminy leans across and works the ball towards fine leg
Hopes gives width outside off stump, McKenzie drives but can't beat cover
Hopes bowls a short ball, McKenzie lets it go by ducking under it
McKenzie walks forward to play the drive towards mid-off
Duminy tries to drive through cover but mis-times the shot
fuller length on off stump, Duminy drives off the front foot towards long off
full delivery on middle stump, McKenzie lens forward and flicks the ball towards deep midwicket
McKenzie greets him with a fierce sweep and places it superbly into the gap at deep midwicket
defended on the leg side
McKenzie moves forward and dabs the ball towards point
Hussey pitches outside leg stump, Duminy works the ball behind square

McKenzie's doing it again, he's picking out the gap at wide long-on! This time he swatted it in the air and Hilfenhaus dived to his right to try and stop it on the boundary, he got a hand to the ball but it trickled on to the rope
McKenzie tries to run it down to third man but gets beaten
driven off the front foot towards cover
McKenzie makes room by moving towards leg and cuts a length delivery towards point
Duminy cuts a good length ball from off stump towards third man, good shot because he didn't have much room to work with
banged in short over the stumps by Hopes, McKenzie makes room but drops his wrists and lets the ball go
another short ball and McKenzie once again sways out of the way
driven firmly off the front foot but straight to the bowler
Duminy gets down on one knee and sweeps from outside off behind square
bowled flat through the air into the right-hander from round the wicket, pushed on the off side for one more
Duminy nudges the ball late down to third man, White fields
Duminy gets down on one knee again and sweeps towards deep square leg
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket for one more
McKenzie steps out of his crease and drives towards long off for a single
McKenzie tries to dab a short of  a length ball outside off stump without using his feet, he gets beaten
McKenzie backs away and pulls a short ball towards deep square leg
Hopes cramps Duminy for room but he still manages to dab the ball towards third man, he's reached a fifty without a boundary, terrific effort, he must be tired!
short ball and Duminy pulls the ball in the air towards deep backward square leg, he nearly gets his first four but Hussey cuts it off
McKenzie backs away towards leg to make room and once again pulls the ball towards deep square leg
played off the pads behind square for a single
short of a length outside off stump, steered towards third man off the back foot
McKenzie stays in his crease and plays the length delivery down to third man
Bracken bowls a short one and Duminy mis-times the pull towards midwicket
good length ball angling into off stump, McKenzie plays the ball towards Clarke at point and takes him on, Clarke misses the stumps at the bowler's end, they are taking singles at will here
dabbed off the back foot behidn point for a single
McKenzie waits for the ball to shape into him before opening the face and picking off another single towards third man, six singles off the over
good length but outside off, played towards third man for one
Duminy tries to force the ball off the back foot through the off side but he mis-times it towards the bowler
that's a short ball from Tait and Duminy ducks under it
bowled full on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a risky single
McKenzie mis-times the ball in the air but it falls safely wide of mid-off for a single
Duminy pushes the last ball off the front foot towards mid-off, he won't get  single
full ball on leg stump, McKenzie misses the flick and gets hit on the pad
pushed towards point for a quick single
Duminy tries to drive off the front foot but gets a thick edge towards point
played off the back foot towards third man
Bracken bowls the yorker and McKenzie digs it out on the off side
McKenzie moves forward and flicks the full ball towards deep square leg
full and wide outside off stump, Duminy plays a lovely square drive into the gap at point, he's not going to get a boundary today! This one is cut off near the rope
driven on the front foot towards the off side
short ball and McKenzie pulls behind square for a single
Duminy tries to pull a short ball but gets an inside edge on to his thigh
full ball on leg stump, Duminy leans forward and flicks off his pads towards deep square leg for his 41st single
driven firmly off the front foot towards cover
full toss and Duminy waits for it before driving towards long-on for a single

outstanding placement! McKenzie skips down the track, makes room by moving towards leg, and lofts the ball inside out over extra cover, he's placed it wide of Bracken at long-off, he reaches his 50 too! Well played!
Mckenzie tries to run a full toss towards third man but misses, he was nearly bowled
McKenzie picks out the gap between deep midwicket and long-on again, he finds the boundary with a flat hit
played off the pads through midwicket once again
McKenzie is toying with Australia now, he pushes towards the off side for a single
he bowls one in the blockhole outside off, McKenzie pushes towards point for  a single

Duminy jumps across stumps and pulls the ball into the gap at deep backward square leg, they run two but want the third, Haddin collects the throw and flicks the ball back on to the stumps, McKenzie is safe though, a huge boo goes round the MCG
full ball on leg stump, McKenzie  nudges the ball off his pads towards the fine-leg boundary, Hopes runs across and dives to save one run
played off the pads through square leg for a single
played through midwicket for a single again

caught! Bracken bowls an off cutter, Duminy flicks the ball off his pads but hits it in the air straight to White, who takes the easiest of catches at midwicket, massive wicket for Australia and they desperately needed it
... and starts off with  wide down leg side
banged in short outside off stump, McKenzie sways out of the way
McKenzie pulls one that isn't so short towards long on, he wanted to go squarer

bowled him! Tait delivers the fast inswinging ball, Boucher is late in bringing his bat down to defend an gets bowled through the bat-pad gap, Boucher goes for a first-ball duck and Australia are right back in this
short and wide outside off stump, van Jaarsveld chases it but misses
short of a length, van Jaarsveld jumps on to the back foot and defends
chipped in the air but it's safe! van Jaarsveld lofts the ball over the fielder at extra cover to score his first runs in one-day cricket
Bracken bowls a slower one outside off and beats van Jaarsveld on the drive, he must be quivering with nerves
van Jaarsveld pushes off the front foot and gets the ball past point for a single, the throw comes into the bowler's end, no one's backing up and they get an overthrow
pushed off the front foot towards point
Bracken bowls it very full and very straight, van Jaarsveld drives down the ground for a single

run out! Bracken goes round the wicket and bowls the slower ball, McKenzie dabs the ball towards midwicket and calls for the single, van Jaarsveld responds but gets into a bit of a tangle with Bracken, Ponting sprints in, picks up and scores a direct hit at the bowler's end with van Jaarsveld miles out
full toss and Albie gets off the mark by driving firmly down the ground
full and straight, defended on the leg side by McKenzie
McKenzie tries to drive through cover but mis-times the shot
the slower ball outside off, McKenzie dabs the ball but hits it into the ground towards Haddin

South Africa are falling apart here! McKenzie flicks the length ball straight to Ponting at midwicket, he fumbles not once but twice but he manages to hold on, he kicks the ball in the air in celebration
good length outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
he beats the bat! Good length outside off at 143 kmh, Albie swings to try and hit the ball through cover but misses
driven firmly off the front foot but straight to cover
Morkel drives the full ball down the ground for a single to long on
Tait swings the yorker into the right-hander, Botha tries to drive but mis-times it towards mid-off
they just can't find the gap! Botha hits the full ball to midwicket, the gap between runs and balls is widening
Botha tries to smash the ball through the off side but gets a bottom edge, only one run off the first Powerplay over
Albie finds the boundary with the square drive! He frees his arms and lashes the ball behind point but wide of third man
Albie wants to hit down the ground but gets an outside edge down to third man, they've got five off the first two balls
Botha gets down on one knee to paddle the ball down to fine leg, he misses and gets hit on the pad, Hilfenhaus appeals but the ball hit the pad outside off
smashed! Hilfenhaus gives Albie width, he frees his arms and blazes the ball over extra cover for four, one bounce over the boundary
Albie gets cramped for room and gets an inside edge on to the body, Botha calls him through for the quick single
Hilfenhaus bowls one in the blockhole, Botha plays it out towards cover, 12 off the over
he bowls a slower yorker which Botha manages to drive towards long off, over to Albie
low full toss and Albie slogs it towards wide long-on for two more
Albie comes down the track, Bracken drops the ball shorter, Albie steers towards short third man
Botha swings the full ball into the gap at midwicket, they'll get two more
the slower ball outside off stump, Botha lines it up and slogs towards deep square leg, just the single this time
that's hammered several rows back! Albie gets under a length delivery and clobbers it with a perfectly straight bat over the bowler's head, terrific strike!
poor line! Too full on leg stump and Botha leans across and flicks the ball past short fine leg for four, awful line when fine leg is in the circle
dug out towards White at cover for  a single, Botha's a goner if White hits at the bowler's end but he misses
Albie's doing it! He's doing it! He moves back to a delivery on leg stump and whips it off his pads past the fielder at short fine leg, superb placement, Tait can't stop it with his dive
Albie Morkel! He waits for a short of a length ball to angle into him, and then opens the face to steer the ball between the keeper and short third man for four
full toss and Albie hits it to Marsh at deep midwicket, he fires the throw back in but can't stop the single
Albie gets an edge towards Bracken at short third man, and he fumbles! He fumbles to allow two extra runs! 18 off the over!
slower ball and Albie hits it gently towards long-on for a single
Botha goes back to cut but gets beaten outside off stump, Haddin is standing up to the stumps
Botha tries to hit one outside off too hard but misses once again, another dot ball

Botha tries to slog again, what is he doing?! He misses and gets hit on the body, he wants the single but gets sent back, Clarke throws the ball to Haddin who breaks the stumps, Botha dives desperately and just makes it back
shorter length and Botha pulls towards deep midwicket for a single, over to Albie
Albie goes back to a length ball and pulls towards deep midwicket, it's heading for the boundary but White dives full length and cuts it off, they run three! Albie keeps the strike
full toss, Albie swings, Albie edges towards short fine leg, he runs the single, the scores are level
Botha swings hard, looking for the big hit down the ground, he inside edges on to his boot, dot ball!

South Africa have won! Botha pushes a low full toss towards mid-off and runs frantically, David Hussey runs in to try and score a run out, but he fumbles, he doesn't pick up, the batsmen complete the single, what scenes of celebration! Botha pumps his fists
